imports-on-top.description: Ensure that all import statements are on top of the file

variable-declarations.description: Ensure that names 'l', 'O' & 'I' are not used for variables

array-declarations.description: Ensure that array declarations don't have space between the type and brackets

operator-whitespace.description: Ensure that operators are surrounded by a single space on either side

conditionals-whitespace.description: Ensure that there is exactly one space between conditional operators and parenthetic blocks

comma-whitespace.description: Ensure that there is no whitespace or comments between comma delimited elements and commas

semicolon-whitespace.description: Ensure that there is no whitespace or comments before semicolons

function-whitespace.description: Ensure function calls and declaration have (or don't have) whitespace in appropriate locations

lbrace.description: Ensure correct positioning of the opening brace '{'

mixedcase.description: Ensure that all variable, function and parameter names follow the mixedCase naming convention

camelcase.description: Ensure that contract, library, modifier and struct names follow CamelCase notation

uppercase.description: Ensure that all constants (and only constants) contain only upper case letters and underscore

no-with.description: Ensure no use of with statements in the code

no-empty-blocks.description: Ensure that no empty blocks {} exist

no-unused-vars.description: Flag all the variables that were declared but never used

double-quotes.description: Ensure that string are quoted with double-quotes only

quotes.description: Ensure that all strings use only 1 style - either double quotes or single quotes.

blank-lines.description: Ensure that there is exactly a 2-line gap between Contract and Funtion declarations

indentation.description: Ensure consistent indentation of 4 spaces per level

arg-overflow.description: In the case of 4+ elements in the same line require they are instead put on a single line each

whitespace.description: Specify where whitespace is suitable and where it isn't

pragma-on-top.description: Ensure a) A PRAGMA directive exists and b) its on top of the file

function-order.description: Ensure that functions in a contract are ordered according to their visibility
